headline: RNR Boosts Dividend, Expands Buyback in Shareholder-Friendly Push
summary: RenaissanceRe increases dividend for 31st straight year and expands buyback to $750M, underscoring confidence in investment income and strong underwriting.

raw.headline: RNR Boosts Dividend, Expands Buyback in Shareholder-Friendly Push

headline: The Hartford’s Future Of Benefits Study: Employers Seeking Simplicity And Ease In The Face Of Increasingly Complex Landscape
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., February 12, 2026--Human resources (HR), employee benefits and evolving technology are converging in new ways and illustrating the need for simplicity, according to the 2026 Future of Benefits Study from The Hartford, a leading provider of employee benefits and absence management services. The study reveals that almost three-quarters (73%) of employer respondents have seen an increase in day-to-day responsibilities over the past few years. As a result, employers are looking for
